record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.created.description
record.value: The date an item was created

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.effective.description
record.value: The time and date an item was first published

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.end.description
record.value: The end date and time of an event

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.expires.description
record.value: The time and date an item was expired

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.getId.description
record.value: The short name of an item (used in the url)

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.getObjPositionInParent.description
record.value: The order of an item in its parent folder

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.getRawRelatedItems.description
record.value: Find items related to the selected items

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.isDefaultPage.description
record.value: Find items that are the default view for their containing folder.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.isFolderish.description
record.value: Find items that can contain other objects

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.modified.description
record.value: The time and date an item was last modified

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.show_inactive.description
record.value: Select which roles have the permission to view inactive objects

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.sortable_title.description
record.value: The item's title, transformed for sorting

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.start.description
record.value: The start date and time of an event

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.date.afterRelativeDate.description
record.value: After N days in the future

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.date.beforeRelativeDate.description
record.value: Before N days in the past

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.date.largerThanRelativeDate.description
record.value: Please enter the number in days.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.date.lessThanRelativeDate.description
record.value: Please enter the number in days.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.intselection.is.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.selection.all.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.selection.any.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.selection.is.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.selection.none.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.string.currentUser.description
record.value: The user viewing the querystring results

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.string.is.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.string.isNot.description
record.value: Tip: you can use * to autocomplete.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.string.relativePath.description
record.value: Use '../' to navigate to parent objects.

record.name: plone.app.querystring.operation.string.showInactive.description
record.value: The user roles which are allowed to see inactive content

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.Creator.description
record.value: The person that created an item

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.SearchableText.description
record.value: Text search of an item's contents

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.Subject.description
record.value: Tags are used for organization of content

record.name: plone.app.querystring.field.Title.description
record.value: Text search of an item's title
